properties.areaDesc: Utah's Dixie and Zion National Park
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 2 at 2:23AM MST until March 3 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds gusts up to 55 mph expected.

* WHERE...Outlying Utahs Dixie. This Advisory does not include the
St. George area.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Travel may be difficult for those operating high profile
vehicles or towing trailers. Wind sensitive operations will be
impacted.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST TUESDAY
